sentences.sContent: According to the scientific team, only one of these four categories of gamblers actually shows signs of a significant pathology.
sentences.sContent_eng: According to the scientific team, only one of these four categories of gamblers actually shows signs of a significant pathology.
sentences.sCn: 根据科学小组得知，事实上在这四种赌徒里只有一种显示出明显的病理学的迹象。

sentences.sContent: Postmortems showed the pathology - signs of disease - in the brains of people with and without long educations were at similar levels.
sentences.sContent_eng: Postmortems showed the pathology - signs of disease - in the brains of people with and without long educations were at similar levels.
sentences.sCn: 验尸报告从病理学角度显示——疾病的现象——人与人的大脑是不存在长期完全一致水平的教育痕迹。

sentences.sCn: 本试验从病原学和病理学角度对长春市某鸡场送检的10只死亡雏鸡的死亡原因进行了系统的研究。
